level.heading: TARIFFS MUST BE FILED AND MAINTAINED WITH THE PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION (ยง5-2510) Prior to commencing service, all certificated local exchange carriers shall fileariffs with the Commission for each service offered within the District. Theariffs shall describe the service being offered and all terms and conditions,nd specify the rate or rates charged for the service pursuant to D.C. Code ยง3-1452(f). Tariffs shall be maintained and updated as necessary.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 2601(April 14, 2000).
